name: The Essential
headline: E-commerce 2.0
description:
The Essential is e-commerce 2.0.

What we do
We make and sell the single best version of all your essentials, at the best price possible.

How we do it
We're not an "everything store."We sell only the essentials, we're members-only and we only sell our own brand. We cut out the middlemen, the brands, the physical stores and the markups — to make products cost a lot less, all while paying the producer more.

Why we do it
To add meaning to people’s lives through
products they use and love, made by people who
know and care, with stories that matter, and
means that are honest.
generated_description:
**The Essential: Pioneering E-Commerce 2.0**

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W17, The Essential is reshaping the way we think about online shopping. With its headquarters in San Francisco and a tight-knit team of 11, this company is on a mission to redefine e-commerce as we know it.

### What They Do

The Essential specializes in creating and selling the best version of all your essentials—think products you use every day but elevated in quality and purpose. Rather than being your typical "everything store," they focus on being a **members-only platform** that exclusively features their own brand. This approach allows them to maintain tight control over the supply chain, cutting out middlemen and excessive markups. What does this mean for you? Lower prices while ensuring producers receive fair payments for their goods.

### How They Do It

They're not just selling products; they're creating a curated experience. By eliminating brand partnerships and physical store expenses, The Essential delivers premium products without the usual premiums attached. They aim for simplicity—with fewer distractions, you can focus on what really matters: quality essentials.

### Why They Do It

At the heart of The Essential's mission is a desire to bring meaning to people's lives through thoughtful products. They are committed to sourcing from producers who care about their craft and telling the stories that matter behind each product. The values of honesty and transparency underpin every transaction.

### The Offerings

From food and beverages to health & beauty products and home essentials, The Essential covers a wide array of categories. Some highlights include artisanal snacks, gourmet ingredients, health supplements, skincare, and even stylish furniture. Each selection is crafted to enhance everyday life without the unnecessary frills.

### Join the Movement

Intrigued? You can dive deeper into their world at [The Essential's website](http://www.theessential.com). Whether you're looking for gourmet pantry staples or quality personal care, The Essential provides a shopping experience that's not only enjoyable but also aligned with a more meaningful consumer ethos.

So, if you want to simplify your shopping while supporting a new wave of ethical e-commerce, look no further than The Essential. They're not just selling goods; they're curating a lifestyle.
